languages.text:
The Mental Tyrant selects a cell in a 20-cell range. All creatures in a 5-cell radius around that cell must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −50 penalty or become {g|f:a7841f4596694e508c302b5ffab92753}slowed{/g}
for 1 round.
languages.translation_comment: Магус выбирает точку в ренже 20клеток. Все цели в радиусе 5 от этой точки должны пройти проверку Воли со сложностью 50 или получить статус Slowed до конца своего следующего хода.

traits.locale_text:
The Mental Tyrant selects a cell in a 20-cell range. All creatures in a 5-cell radius around that cell must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −50 penalty or become {g|f:a7841f4596694e508c302b5ffab92753}slowed{/g}
for 1 round.

languages.text: The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All creatures in a 5-cell radius around that cell must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Magus picks a point in 20 cells range. All creatures in 5sq range around this point must succeed at Willpower saving throw of DC 50, or become Slowed for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: The Mental Tyrant selects a cell in a 20-cell range. All creatures in a 5-cell radius around that cell must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −50 penalty or become slowed for 1 round.
The Mental Tyrant selects a cell in a 20-cell range. All creatures in a 5-cell radius around that cell must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −50 penalty or become slowed for 1 round.

The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All creatures in a 5-cell radius around that cell must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −50 penalty or become {g|f:a7841f4596694e508c302b5ffab92753}slowed{/g} for 1 round.

The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All creatures in a 5-cell radius around that cell must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: El tirano mental elige una casilla en un radio de 20 casillas. Todas las criaturas en un radio de 5 casillas de la elegida deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −50 o quedarán {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizadas{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All creatures in a 5-cell radius around that cell must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El tirano mental elige una casilla en un radio de 20 casillas. Todas las criaturas en un radio de 5 casillas de la elegida deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −50 o quedarán {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizadas{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: 精神的支配者は半径20セル内のセルを選択する。そのセルの半径5セル内にいるすべての生物は、{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−50で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}状態になる。
languages.original_text: The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All creatures in a 5-cell radius around that cell must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 精神的支配者は半径20セル内のセルを選択する。そのセルの半径5セル内にいるすべての生物は、{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−50で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}状態になる。

languages.text: 心灵暴君选择20格内的任意格子，目标格周围5格内的所有生物都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-50{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All creatures in a 5-cell radius around that cell must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 心灵暴君选择20格内的任意格子，目标格周围5格内的所有生物都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-50{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Der Mentaltyrann wählt eine Zelle in einem Radius von 20 Zellen aus. Alle Kreaturen in einem Radius von 5 Zellen um diese Zelle müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -50 bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g} zu werden.
languages.original_text: The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All creatures in a 5-cell radius around that cell must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Mentaltyrann wählt eine Zelle in einem Radius von 20 Zellen aus. Alle Kreaturen in einem Radius von 5 Zellen um diese Zelle müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -50 bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g} zu werden.

languages.text: Le Tyran psychique sélectionne une cellule dans un rayon de 20 cases. Toutes les créatures dans un rayon de 5 cases doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −50. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All creatures in a 5-cell radius around that cell must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le Tyran psychique sélectionne une cellule dans un rayon de 20 cases. Toutes les créatures dans un rayon de 5 cases doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −50. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Ментальный тиран выбирает клетку на расстоянии до 20 клеток. Все существа в радиусе 5 клеток вокруг нее совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −50 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлены{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All creatures in a 5-cell radius around that cell must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
